Interface FlipFitScheduleDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitScheduleDAO
public interface FlipFitScheduleDAOInterface
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for handling schedule-related operations in FlipFit system. This interface defines methods for adding, retrieving, modifying schedules, and fetching schedules by specific criteria.
Author:
gamma-group

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSchedule(FlipFitSchedule schedule)
    Adds a new schedule to the system.
    List<FlipFitSchedule>
    getAllScheduleByDate(Date date)
    Retrieves all schedules scheduled for a specific date.

    Retrieves a schedule based on its ID.
    boolean
    modifySchedule(String scheduleId, int action)
    Modifies a schedule based on its ID and action.

  • Method Details

    • addSchedule

      void addSchedule(FlipFitSchedule schedule)
      Adds a new schedule to the system.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The FlipFitSchedule object representing the schedule to add

    • getSchedule

      FlipFitSchedule getSchedule(String scheduleId)
      Retrieves a schedule based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - ID of the schedule to retrieve
      Returns:
      The FlipFitSchedule object

    • getAllScheduleByDate

      List<FlipFitSchedule> getAllScheduleByDate(Date date)
      Retrieves all schedules scheduled for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - Date for which schedules are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of schedules scheduled for the specified date

    • modifySchedule

      boolean modifySchedule(String scheduleId, int action)
      Modifies a schedule based on its ID and action.
      Parameters:
      scheduleId - ID of the schedule to modify
      action - Action to perform on the schedule (e.g., update, delete)
      Returns:
      True if the modification was successful, false otherwise
